text: INACH Logo derived from the Chilean Government Logo. The Chilean Antarctic Institute (in Spanish Instituto Antártico Chileno) is a public service institution in charge of managing and coordinating scientific activities in the Chilean Antarctic Territory. It is the national Antarctic operator and has an active role in Antarctic affairs. ==External links== *Official website Category:Chilean Antarctic Territory Category:Research institutes in Chile Category:Science and technology in Antarctica Category:Antarctic agencies Category:Chile and the Antarctic
title: Instituto Antártico Chileno
